relation: Basic thumbnail support for KHTMLPart views(almost finished, now cleanup code)
more thumbnail page styles and customization
Move Dolphin's Treeview to libkonq so that it can be used in Konqueror
Move Dolphin's Information panel to libkonq so that it can be used in Konqueror
Matthias's Audio/ Video preview in Information panel
Allow to configure and download service menus
Use Nepomuk to receive the meta data for the Information panel
Let user choose if folders are always shown first or not
Redesign manage profile dialog to allow users to sort profiles
Allow window/terminal size to be set in profiles
Add support in for pluginbased Drag'n'drop popup menus (and in my case, an "extract here" menu on dragged archives)
History browser as independent from sidebar, and improved (different grouping style, sorting, etc).
